head.title: Randi J. Rosenberg Weds M.D. Steele

hedline.hl1: Randi J. Rosenberg Weds M.D. Steele

block.p: LEAD: Randi Joy Rosenberg and Matthew David Steele were married yesterday at Temple Beth-El in Great Neck, L.I. Rabbi Jerome K. Davidson officiated, assisted by Cantor Barbara Horowitz. The couple's parents are Mr. and Mrs. Louis Rosenberg of San Jose, Calif., and Dr. and Mrs. Theodore K. Steele of Great

LEAD: Randi Joy Rosenberg and Matthew David Steele were married yesterday at Temple Beth-El in Great Neck, L.I. Rabbi Jerome K. Davidson officiated, assisted by Cantor Barbara Horowitz. The couple's parents are Mr. and Mrs. Louis Rosenberg of San Jose, Calif., and Dr. and Mrs. Theodore K. Steele of Great

Randi Joy Rosenberg and Matthew David Steele were married yesterday at Temple Beth-El in Great Neck, L.I. Rabbi Jerome K. Davidson officiated, assisted by Cantor Barbara Horowitz. The couple's parents are Mr. and Mrs. Louis Rosenberg of San Jose, Calif., and Dr. and Mrs. Theodore K. Steele of Great Neck.

Mrs. Steele is a petroleum engineer who until recently was a consultant to the East Mediterranean Oil and Gas Company in Tel Aviv. She is an alumna of Stanford University. Her father and her mother, Annette Rosenberg, retired recently from the International Business Machines Corporation in San Jose as a manager with special duties to train handicapped people to become computer programmers and as a systems analyst, respectively.

Mr. Steele is a senior financial analyst for Texaco, in Harrison, N.Y. He graduated from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology's Alfred P. Sloan School of Management from which he also received a master's degree in finance. His father is a senior vice president for academic affairs and dean of faculty at the New York Institute of Technology. His mother, Marcia Steele, is a substitute teacher in the Great Neck school system and vice president of the Per Diem Chapter of the Great Neck Teachers Association.
